Changelog
=========

1.0.1 (2013-05-15)
------------------

- Fix to work offline
  [Asko Soukka]

1.0.0 (2012-01-26)
------------------

- Fixed overlay to use common content filter and add css class into overlay.
- Added style to prevent overlay iframe having box shadow.
- Fixed cachekey to include calendar_id.
- Fixed event-view layout and traversing.
- Fixed unicode-issues with displaying event title or description.
